import { Button } from '@mui/material' import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import '../Details/UserList.css' import { Actiontypes } from '../Reducer/action' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' export const UserList = () => { const contacts = useSelector((state) => state); const dispatch = useDispatch() const deleteAccount = (id) => { dispatch({ type: Actiontypes.DELETE_CONTACT, payload: id }) } return (
{contacts.length > 0 ? ( contacts.map((contact, id) => ( )) ) : ( )}
id Name Type Description Edit Delete
{id + 1} {contact.name} {contact.type} {contact.description}
No contacts found
{/* */}
) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ contacts: state, }); export default (mapStateToProps)(UserList);
